attributes.action: bring back the policy of regular checks at school for head lice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day my children come home from school with their heads covered in lice,the treatments are very expensive and often do not work,I think it is about time we brought back the nit nurse to schools,so i therefore demand that every schoolchild in the uk has regular checks at school by a nurse to combat this epidemic

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "bring back the policy of regular checks at school for head lice."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21453
